title: What about new Featured Game Mode: URF [read before hate!]
body:
"URF, oh my gash, not this thing again!!111"

Nope, that's not the URF I'd like to talk. I mean:

#UBER
#RANDOM
#FINALLE

NEW Game mode. This is the limits of what **RANDOM ** could mean!

Random player names!
Random Map (Urf/Ascension/Nemesis)
Random champion
#RANDOM ABILITIES
Random runes (not personal runes)
Random masteries
Random summoner spells...
...That get randomly changed after one use!
Random sizes of minion wave (equal for both sides)
Random minions! 10 cannons in a wave? DEAL WITH IT!
Random jungle monsters. 5 dragons in a jungle? Why the fk no?
Random...

#EVERYTHING!

---

######For Yasuo/Riven/Vayne mains along with people with total lack of imagination that's how it'd look like:

You start the game.
You get an Alistar
Game starts.
URF-mode
Ascension map
Your alistar has Hecarims passive **(not shown in ability tooltips, you gotta guess and remember!)** your Q is Urchin strike W tossing a JitB and E becomes spell shield. And ultimate!... Phenix stance, unlucky you!
Your summoner spells are flash and smite, cool'eh? Used them once? Barrier and ghost!
And runes/masteries indicate you are full fledged AD pain dealer!

Just a second ago your teammate was smashed by a Brands mushroom! 

Overall madness!

Pick a mascot to replace the Nexus and they grant random powers during the match to your team. Could even go further and have them use abilities from a connection to them, Poro King grants Freijlord abilities. Devil Teemo grants yordle abilities. Not sure who the other mascots would be.
